text: On TIKA-2132, Seva Alekseyev shared an xlsm file that causes an NPE because some sheets whose state is "veryHidden" do not have a relationship id.  We should check for empty relationship ids when state is veryHidden.
creator: tallison@mitre.org
tallison@mitre.org
text: Hidden/veryHidden had nothing to do with it.  The file has some entries in the worksheet list that have empty strings for the relationship id.  Excel appears to ignore these entries, so I guess we should, too?

<sheet name="Room" sheetId="5" r:id="rId5"/>

<sheet name="Module1" sheetId="7" state="veryHidden" r:id=""/>
creator: tallison@mitre.org
